## Checklist

- [ ] I have opened an issue if this is a new feature or major change
- [ ] My PR is focused on a single feature or fix
- [ ] I have synced my branch with `main`
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have added or updated tests
- [ ] I have updated documentation if necessary
- [ ] My commit messages are clear and follow Conventional Commits
